levels.levelDescription: Shadows deepen as twilight falls upon the dark-dirt paths of this eerie level. Beware of the treacherous deep-dark-holes that lurk beneath the veils of darkness.
The snow-covered grounds of Eclipse Enclave glisten under the eternal twilight. Navigate through the icy terrain while avoiding the chilling waters that threaten to hinder your progress.

Enter the Abyssal Veil, where rusty-chain-platforms hang precariously above rivers of molten lava. Here lies the domain of Xyraphas the Shadowed, the Ephemeral Void Stalker, veiled in darkness and malice.
